Content.Text:
<FACE_LICORICE><POS_LEFT><FACE_LAUGH>
<NAME_UNKNOWN>Ooh! This is definitely a rare specimen...

<FACE_LICORICE><POS_LEFT><FACE_LAUGH>
<NAME_UNKNOWN>Whoa! So is this one!
<PAGE>
This town is a treasure trove of excellent plant
life! I'm so glad I came...

<FACE_LICORICE><POS_LEFT><FACE_LOSS>
I-I'm not a loony weirdo, really. My name is
<BLUE>Licorice</BLUE>. I'm a botanist.

<FACE_LICORICE><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Ah. So you are <MYNAME>, and you're a
farmer? I see. It's nice to meet you.

<FACE_LICORICE><POS_LEFT><FACE_LAUGH>
I've been told that there's an unusual amount of
rare and interesting plants in this town. After
hearing that, I had to check it out myself.
<PAGE>
Just exploring this area here, I've uncovered
many strange plants! For example, look at this
one. It's--

<FACE_LICORICE><POS_LEFT><FACE_LOSS>
E-erm. Pardon me.
<PAGE>
My excitement got the better of me for a minute.

<FACE_LICORICE><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
It's just that the thought of being able to
research this town's plants and flowers gets me
all fired up. I want to get started right away.
<PAGE>
You said you were a farmer, correct?
<PAGE>
I'm sure you must have interesting specimens
growing on your farm. I'll be staying at the inn
for a while. Can I pay you a visit sometime?

<FACE_LICORICE><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Thanks. Now then, I have to be going. Plants to
see, information to record.
